__e: Then she started seeing illusions and went mad. That's it.
I know something bad is going on, so they say I'm delusional and give me pills, drugs, to try and keep me quiet, knowing that if I stop taking the drugs and speak up, I'm gonna sound crazy.
What was even worse than that was, she would have hallucinations, and...
But I suppose that was just another one of your homicidal hallucinations, wasn't it?
You're a miracle, or... or I'm just hallucinating from starvation.
Staring at the yellow wallpaper day after day... she begins to hallucinate that there are women trapped in the pattern.
